name: Erroneous (Erroneous)
description:
A game that My friend and I made on Unity over the past couple of months. It is still very much in development. It's a first person shooter game that you can play with your friends, where there are gamemodes such as Team Deathmatch, King of the Hill, and Free-For-All. I plan on adding several more gamemodes in the future, such as Capture the Flag, Infection, and a Story Mode. I plan to release more games in the future.

If you are interested in helping us make this game, will it be bug reporting or play testing, join our Discord!

https://discord.gg/D74VbvXe5F

"P" - die

"." - Switch Teams

"Middle-Click" - Throw Grenade
